QuestData.Title: Out of Body Experience
QuestData.Description: Ah, you seek a vision of the past. You're a wise $r.$B$BEvery time someone drops by for a reading, they seem to always ask about the future. When you get to be my age, you learn that scrying the past, more often than not, is more useful.$B$BDrink this potion and peer into my crystal ball. Let us see what knowledge we can obtain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drink the Gossamer Potion near Ruuna's Crystal Ball and witness the Vision from the Past.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Ruuna the Blind at Ruuna's Camp in Grizzly Hills.
QuestData.RewardText: Did you learn anything from your vision? You mentioned Solstice Village during your trance -- which marks the second time someone has spoken the place's name today.
